DOC.brief_summary: Would like quit smoking ? Seattle 's Fred Hutchinson Cancer Research Center launch new study may able help . Participants enroll study randomly assign computer ( like flip coin ) one two online program . The goal study learn program effective help people stop smoking . Findings study use help build effective online smoke cessation program future . Participants smoke cessation program use study receive : - Interactive tool deal effectively urges smoke - Step-by-step guide quit smoke - Personalized plan quit remain smoke-free - Electronic link reach one-on-one expert help quit Participants ask complete online questionnaire , include brief three-month follow-up survey . There cost participating study . To enroll study information , please visit www.webquit.com . This study conduct Seattle 's Fred Hutchinson Cancer Research Center ( www.fhcrc.org ) , world leader advance prevention , diagnosis treatment cancer . The principal investigator WebQuit smoking cessation study Dr. Jonathan Bricker , faculty member Hutchinson Center University Washington Seattle .
DOC.criteria: 18 old current resident US someone smoke daily least past 12 month someone want quit smoke next 30 day willing able read English able connect Internet least one hour per week three consecutive month able use website participate smoke cessation intervention willing able complete Baseline Survey willing randomize either online program inability meet inclusion criterion
